TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CursorConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Converts a object to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorConverter> works for two modes: specifying a standard cursor (one of the static constant names of <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors>) or specifying a file name. The named file must be a `.cur` or `.ani` file identified by extension. See [How to: Change the Cursor Type](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-change-the-cursor-type.md).
